bio.name: Kalle Mäkelä
bio.description: I'm a Ph.D. student building machine learning systems that decode brain activity from fNIRS signals. My work bridges signal processing, neural networks, and brain-computer interfaces, with a side hobby of making code that is actually usable by others.
